import React, { useState } from 'react' import './StoneFilter.css' const StoneFilterListItem = ({ type = "checkbox", id, name, value, checked = false, onChange }) => { console.log('Filter Item: ', name, checked) return ( ) } const StoneFilter = () => { const [stoneType, setStoneType] = useState({}) const [stoneColor, setStoneColor] = useState({}) const handleTypeChange = event => { setStoneType({ ...stoneType, [event.target.value]: event.target.checked }) console.log('checked types: ', stoneType) } const checkboxesType = [ { id: "Marbre", key: "checkbox1", label: "marbre" }, { id: "Granit", key: "checkbox2", label: "granit" }, { id: "Onyx", key: "checkbox3", label: "onyx" }, { id: "Travertin", key: "checkbox4", label: "travertin" }, { id: "Quartz", key: "checkbox5", label: "quartz" }, { id: "Terrazzo", key: "checkbox6", label: "terrazzo" } ] return (
